sentence.Network_en: Regular exercise can increase your basal metabolic rate.

sentence.Network_en: Your metabolic rate is the speed at which your body transforms food into energy.
sentence.Network_cn: 新陈代谢率是身体把食物转换为能量的速度。

sentence.Network_en: Chemical carcinogens generally require metabolic conversion to some form of " ultimate " carcinogen.
sentence.Network_cn: 化学致癌物一般需要通过代谢来转换成某种形式的 “ 最终 ” 致癌物.
